data.text: I have to commit to Kelly on when we can install it on her PC and Monday evening CST is the best we can do so that she can try it out before May 15th deadline. Please get all your plans/challenges aligned and talk to each other. We have time till Mon morning. Key to us getting out of this situation is to think in advance for the issues we might face and talk to each other often.
Quire is updated with the list of tasks, plz make sure you follow the priorities and due dates. Happy to brainstorm to meet the deadline

Summary of today's call with Kelly:
37 mins

KO Knows Intro/Coffee Chat - Anindya Singh Obi
May 6, 2024
*Meeting Purpose:*
Discuss task prioritization product demo and get feedback from Kelly on the value proposition and functionality. Also discuss potential pilot testing of the product.

*Key Takeaways*
• Kelly sees value in having a tool to help prioritize tasks from multiple sources and applications
• Being able to quickly generate responses like emails based on tasks is useful
• Accountability for non-checklist strategic items is important
• Kelly is open to piloting the tool with a new client starting May 15
*Topics:*

*Product Demo*
• Dana walked through a demo of the task prioritization and email generation functionality
• Pulls in tasks from Trello, Google Calendar, Gmail etc and prioritizes based on due date, priority level
• Also able to generate email responses when prompted by user, by looking up details on the related task
*Feedback on Value Proposition*
• Kelly felt the functionality made sense for validating and reprioritizing daily tasks
• Liked that it pulls from multiple sources and applications
• Raised a question about how to incorporate strategic non-checklist items
*Strategic Planning Tasks*
• Kelly gave examples of strategic planning and business development time
• These may not be specific checklist tasks but are important
• Tool needs flexibility to make these a priority
*Pilot Testing*
• Kelly is starting with a new client May 15 and is open to piloting the tool
• She is still defining the tasks for this engagement
• This would be a blueprint for repeatable client engagements in the future
• Kelly uses a PC most of the time so Windows-compatible version needed
*Next Steps:*
• Kelly to send a list of all apps she uses for work
• Team to build Windows-compatible version
• Setup product and provide access to Kelly before May 15
• Kelly to pilot the tool and provide feedback via likes/dislikes

kshitij told me one approach to use keywords like eod , due date etc to reduce the data for task priority but this approach will only work for communication apps and not for actual task organiser apps like trello , quire etc

Hi <@U04JS6KHQ6R> & <@U04JKUPR8BG> I need an explanation of why we have charges on notification hub on Azure when HuTouch ecosystem app is not being used by any one. Please close this out by EOD tomorrow:
Can you please confirm rate for "Google - Implement Customer Segmentation" by EOD 05/10/2024
Can you please setup some recurring meetings for us on "Niiti - Set Up Feedback Loops" to discuss about status on daily basis. Please set it up with agenda by 05/08/2024
When ready, can you please send us meeting summary and recording on our call for "OpenAI - Measure and Report Customer Success". Would be great if you can send it by 05/06/2024

<@U04JS6KHQ6R> & <@U04JNQS5HPG> please test in local end to end and find out which parts are broken, discuss it with <@U04JKUPR8BG> and see what is the solution or files we need from his laptop. Please make sure you have identified all the issues in end to end tonight. Send me the list of the issues you find here after you have it identified.
We need a solution to reduce the data sent to assistant AI
Who is working on these? I need updates plz?

Hi <@U04JKUPR8BG>, I see sagemaker used for 5 months with charges close to $970. I thought we had this disabled. Why are there so hefty charges on our AWS account for Sagemaker? I need details on what happened here. Who used Sagemaker, why was it used and when was it shut down. I don't remember us using it in for more than a month, but the charges show it has been used since Oct till Jan
